thread.title: TherapySites (Websites for Therapists) New Affiliation with Florida Counseling Association
thread.title_full: TherapySites (Websites for Therapists) Announces New Affiliation with Florida Counseling Association

author: Denise Marshall
title: TherapySites (Websites for Therapists) New Affiliation with Florida Counseling Association
text:
TherapySites, the leading website and online marketing company for mental health professionals, announced today its affiliation with Florida Counseling Association (FCA). This new relationship will allow TherapySites to continue to extend their online marketing solutions to FCA members with the addition of exclusive benefits and promotional offers. “Our mission is to provide mental health professionals with the tools and resources for an effective online presence,” said Denise Marshall, Business Development Manager at TherapySites. “That is why we are so excited for the new relationship with FCA, as we’ll be able to provide even more therapists with this effective tool to shape their online presence.”
About Florida Counseling Association:
Florida Counseling Association’s mission is to promote the value of professionals counseling as well as supporting and unifying professional counselors in all settings resulting in high quality practices in Florida through public awareness, professional development, and advocacy.
About TherapySites: Websites for Therapists
TherapySites specializes in creating mobile responsive websites that are engaging, professional, cost-effective, and extremely simple to maintain, helping mental health professionals successfully market and manage their practice online. The TherapySites package includes everything necessary for a professional online presence, including basic search engine optimization (SEO), integrated email & editing tools, credit card processing, and online appointment notifications, all with no contracts or setup fees and unlimited technical and customer support. For more information, contact us at 866-288-2771.
As an added benefit, FCA members will receive their first month free with TherapySites by entering promo code "FCA". For more information about how to start building an online presence, visit http://www.therapysites.com.
